attributes.action: Stop the building of 450 houses in the green fields of Cam
attributes.background: Stroud district council want to allow - A mixed use development comprising of up to 450 dwellings, 10.7 hectares of employment land for Use Classes B1, B2 and B8 with associated parking and servicing - all to be built on the beautiful green fields of Lower Cam.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Stroud District Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:
http://www.stroud.gov.uk/democracy/have_your_say.asp#s=sectioncontent5
